description: Make tonight taco night with our easy vegetarian taco recipe. This simple recipe with black beans, juicy corn and creamy avocado really delivers on flavour.
name: Black Bean & Corn Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 corn cobs, silks and husks discarded, kernels removed
2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
6 small radishes, trimmed, cut into thin wedges
2 lime, juiced (save 1 lime, halved, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over high heat. Cook corn, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until charred and tender. Transfer to a medium bowl. Set aside to cool.

Meanwhile, finely chop three-quarters of the coriander leaves. Heat half the oil in same pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 3 minutes or until softened. Add seasoning and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add beans and cup water, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes or until beans are heated through and sauce has thickened. Stir in half the chopped coriander. Season with pepper. Top with remaining coriander leaves.

Add radish, lime juice, and remaining chopped coriander and oil to corn, then stir to combine. Season with pepper. Top tortillas with bean mixture, corn salsa and avocado. Season with pepper and serve.
